oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A manuscript book. Auen and Naron notebook, volume IV. Words and sentences, mostly the latter. Some interesting descriptions and notes on relations with others, customs and names for things, mention of history of the peoples of the region, cultural practice, markings on the body, birth, death, and so on.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dorothea Bleek - Book BC151_A3_015
